works.title: THE TUB
works.oneliner: An acrylic listening instrument and machine accompanist that sits on the floor like a prism extruded from the ground.
works.description: THE TUB is a floor-bound acrylic prism that listens, remembers, and plays back with you. Visitors plug in instruments or devices and shape the systemâ€™s behavior with industrial Allen-Bradley switches. Inside the tub, a small computer analyzes the shared sound field and answers through a multi-speaker array, treating the gallery as a co-produced instrument.
